website_summaries.verdict: Contains 2 balls in different sizes and 3 stretch-resistance bands, as well as an exercise manual.
pros: Having 2 balls opens up a lot more exercise options for Pilates, yoga, and general fitness
The larger one is sturdy enough to use as a chair
Exercise manual is basic but easy to follow
cons: Some issues with the pump inflating the balls properly

customer_reviews.title: A real bargain
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful colors and good material. I was surprised to get two balls (I did not notice that it is a set), for that price. It is a huge advantage as there are plenty of things that require two fit balls. The exercise manual is pretty basic, but I found it beneficial, as the more detailed manuals are often not clear as this one is. The pump is very effective (my 8 years old daughter inflated the large ball), and capable of fully inflate the large ball within few minutes). Overall, for this price, this is a steal.
customer_reviews.author: O. Nissan

customer_reviews.title: Inflation workout
customer_reviews.text: Workout #1- pumping up the ball. This is, by far, the worst design I've ever experienced. I would rather inflate a family size raft with my breath instead of using this chintzy pump (unfortunately, the design requires you to use a pump). If I had an automatic pump, it wouldn't be an issue. Nonetheless, the balls are OK.. not worth the price tag. Lesson learned to just go back to TJMaxx/Marshalls/Ross for a less of a cost and work to get the product.
customer_reviews.author: Southern Charmer

customer_reviews.title: The pump is not very good and the method of pumping the air into the ...
customer_reviews.text: I was not impressed with this ball at all. The pump is not very good and the method of pumping the air into the ball doesn’t allow the cap or plug to be placed quick enough or well enough to contain the air. The ball always seems only partially filled with air and therefore doesn’t seem very stable. The balls seem flatter than they should be. The quality of the balls aren’t that bad but the fact that they don’t keep the air sufficiently inside when inflating, makes these balls unfit for proper ball usage.
customer_reviews.author: Sam-I-am

customer_reviews.title: The pump was easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I want to start off by saying the booklet included is helpful, but the picture of a mannequin sitting on the exercise ball, with a woman's face photoshopped on it was disturbing and an entertaining surprise! The pump was easy to use, and the balls seem to be fairly durable. Initially the type of rubber used for the balls felt a bit thin to me, but they have held up very well, no issues. The band I've used briefly, and is the quality you'd expect of a thin, cheap resistance band. Would purchase again. Price has increased but is still a good deal!
customer_reviews.author: This Is My Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Missing a resistance band
customer_reviews.text: The product I bought said it was a bundle with resistance band. All the images and the descriptions led me to believe there should have been some. There were not. Less sturdy than the other brand that I also bought. Next time I won't go for the "deal" and will just buy what I need separately.
customer_reviews.author: Sarani Rangarajan

customer_reviews.title: pump broke after one use
customer_reviews.text: The ball itself it decent, however the pump that came with it is a piece of junk. It broke before even getting the ball completely inflated, so we blew it up with our mouths. Because of this, I'd say it isn't that easy to inflate. I do like that it comes with 2 balls so that makes it a pretty good value.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Quality and durable.
customer_reviews.text: These quality balls are durable, strong and reasonably priced. The included air pump makes set-up easy. Due to bulging discs in my back, I have been in physical therapy. These balls allow me to do Abdominal/Core exercises that are extremely helpful in reducing the pain and improving overall health. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: J M Ray

customer_reviews.title: Use Every Day
customer_reviews.text: I use the large ball and the elastic bands every day when I do yoga/Pilates. Unfortunately the small ball deflated, however I was not using it anyway so a great deal for me.
customer_reviews.author: Gina E. Macias

customer_reviews.title: So nice, I bought it twice! :)
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for myself, and have been loving having an instant "gym/yoga studio" in my home now! Super easy to inflate and figure out..(even for newbies) That's what inspired my second purchase for my aging mother to help motivate some more movement in her daily life. Turned out to be a great gift, too! Fun, inexpensive work out package that even comes with an exercise guide and resistance bands.
customer_reviews.author: celeste

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable.
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I finished inflating the larger ball, it went skittering across the grass and promptly blew out. It lasted approximately 15 seconds. I promise it wasn't over-inflated; I actually was very careful and was worried it was under-inflated. The purple ball is holding up well, though, and I like the shiny sheen.
customer_reviews.author: Bon Mots

customer_reviews.title: Very thin!
customer_reviews.text: If you want one for the long term, pass this one by. I had it for not even two weeks before my little guy punctured it with a cupboard handle. Disappointing, to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Marm

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected...
customer_reviews.text: I really like the bands. As for the large ball, it is not very solid. If you weigh more than 130 lbs you will sink into the ball. I prefer something I can use with weights. This is not it. It states on the directions not to use weights while on the balls. :( slightly disappointing. I don't really use the smaller ball. Definitely not a good choice for men, unless you are very light.
customer_reviews.author: wendy C

customer_reviews.title: pump sucks
customer_reviews.text: The yoga balls work great the pump sucks I’m a broke within 15 minutes of pumping up the ball I’m had to finish blowing up the ball with my only ones other than that great product
customer_reviews.author: Misty Austad

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money & time
customer_reviews.text: Impossible to inflate. Weak flimsy little pump that wouldn’t even fit in in ball. Even if it did, it would probably take days to inflate. I returned after about an hour trying to figure it out. Don’t buy. Waste of money & time.
customer_reviews.author: edward redington

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I’m having coccyx pain and my Physical Therapist suggested me purchasing the bands and large ball. Both are working well in relieving my pain. The overall package and price was excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent shopper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Exercise Additions
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this set because I am in Physical Therapy twice a week and use some of these in my routines. Now I can continue my exercises at home also
customer_reviews.author: Wanda L. Little

customer_reviews.title: Balls lol
customer_reviews.text: Much better directions are needed in order to fill it up.
customer_reviews.author: Alice R

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: It came in a compact box, and the instructions were easy to follow. I've been using both blue and purple balls for months now, and they've been sturdy and stable.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: The pump that is included is a joke.  BUT the two yoga balls are GREAT.
customer_reviews.text: The two balls are beautiful and substantial. Love them! BUT the tiny pump that is included is cheap and way too small to pump up the balls. I threw the pump away and bought a good one. Even without a pump this is a good price for the two products.
customer_reviews.author: Y Bazor

customer_reviews.title: Directive?
customer_reviews.text: Blew up the small ball and it would hold air realized there was a hole right near the plug
customer_reviews.author: kristie josue

customer_reviews.title: The best is the quality of product durability.
customer_reviews.text: I really like them, my daughter she love to play as exercising ;)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely order again!!!
customer_reviews.text: GREAT VALUE!! I would encourage you to purchase this set. Great bang for your buck!!!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Ash K

customer_reviews.title: Yoga ball
customer_reviews.text: Recieved item quickly and in great condition. I was completely satisfied with purchase. Everything was included just like advertised. It also came with a quick reference guide that showed several exercises to use with ball and demonstrations. Will buy from again.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Value received for amount spent
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my lower back and hips after being in a car accident last year. I use it to loosen up with.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice item
customer_reviews.text: great item to have it was easy to follow directions
customer_reviews.author: Fa

customer_reviews.title: This Yoga & Pilates Exercise Ball is excellent. It's really good for your back
customer_reviews.text: This Yoga & Pilates Exercise Ball is excellent. It's really good for your back. It's so comfortable to use, I use it twice a day and I feel great. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dina Winchester

customer_reviews.title: Inflation pump low quality
customer_reviews.text: Item description should detail who to use inflation pump better
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary Piatkowski

customer_reviews.title: Love these exercise balls
customer_reviews.text: Love these exercise balls. My little 5 year old uses the little one to work out with me. Love the pump that is included too. They seem to hold air very well.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Rasmussen

customer_reviews.title: Better description of pump would have helped upsell me to better pump
customer_reviews.text: All is good. Both balls work as described. i use daily. Thank You, ed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shines balls. 2 for 1 deal
customer_reviews.text: It’s 2 shiny balls. It is what it is-deal wit it
customer_reviews.author: Cyrus Byrd

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this item
customer_reviews.text: Comes in a nice packaging. Easy to install. I love the colors.
customer_reviews.author: Riot

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Is a really good deal for the product. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Chicago7200

customer_reviews.title: The foot pump breaks very easily
customer_reviews.text: Balls are easy to inflate with provided needles and air tank.
customer_reviews.author: rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Ball is much smaller than it looks.
customer_reviews.text: I would not order this again. I ordered 65mm and I am only 5'3" . It actually said to order smaller one with my height, but I wanted it to be bigger. I feel like I am almost sitting on the floor. I despise returning things so I will deal with it, but not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy R.

customer_reviews.title: purfect
customer_reviews.text: i love this one. it has 1 for me and a little size ball for my granddaughter.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: Came during the time advertised. I love the durability a will order from this company again.. Great price for all I received.
customer_reviews.author: Draybae

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended, very happy with it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! very hight quality, easy to put together and finally I'm back to my exercise!
customer_reviews.author: Chani Furchtgott

customer_reviews.title: handicapped could not use the pump
customer_reviews.text: The foot pump that came with the set is unusable for inflating the balls. I would recommend that the company make an adapter to fill the inflated items from any cmpressor
customer_reviews.author: Donna Scott

customer_reviews.title: Overall good
customer_reviews.text: Smaller then expected. Had to blow up by mouth which wasn’t fun. But nice to have multiple sizes for fair price.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Z.

customer_reviews.title: Good service and product for the money
customer_reviews.text: Ball leaks a little. Arrived quickly the pump is a bit on the cheap side but otherwise happy with the items
customer_reviews.author: GinaO

customer_reviews.title: The customer service is excellent! They stand behind their word and products and ...
customer_reviews.text: The customer service is excellent! They stand behind their word and products and really make good on their promises which is rare these days. I highly recommend this package, having 2 different sized exercise balls gives you so many different options in workouts. Also the colors/sheen are aesthetically appealing.
customer_reviews.author: Sithli

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I started doing Pilates at home, my instructor old me that there is so many great things you can do with a yoga ball!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yes!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, really nice quality! I really enjoy the small ball!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nope. Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Flattened like pancakes and wouldn't stay aired up. Pumping them full should be an athletic event!
customer_reviews.author: Lacey Kincaid

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: They are true sizes as shown on pictures and no problem. It’s very easy to pump.
customer_reviews.author: VickyS

customer_reviews.title: 1 day and re-pump
customer_reviews.text: Both balls lose air after 1 use! They have to be pumped up everyday. Although continuous pumping may exercise your calfs it is not how I planned to spend my time.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Knell

customer_reviews.title: I just received my package and I didn’t have the ...
customer_reviews.text: I just received my package and I didn’t have the pump in it. I am sending it back for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: sharon becker

customer_reviews.title: Great products. Great value
customer_reviews.text: Kids love these balls to play with and roll around the house. Mom loves them for workouts!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa McLean

customer_reviews.title: The big ball is not big enough.
customer_reviews.text: I expected this to be taller so i could bounce and relieve some pregnancy discomfort.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Engel

customer_reviews.title: Very satisified
customer_reviews.text: Everything that came with it worked well. I have enjoyed using it thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty good and for the price I can't complain.
customer_reviews.author: vanessa sierra

customer_reviews.title: Balls
customer_reviews.text: Durable and perfect sizes. Kind of a crappy pump but you can use the attachment on your own to inflate
customer_reviews.author: Richele M.

customer_reviews.title: The pump did not work.
customer_reviews.text: The pump did not work at all. We had to use another pump to inflate it.
customer_reviews.author: Ms.G

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I thought that it was going to be hard to air the balls but it was fairly easy and it is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Evangelina Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: great set!
customer_reviews.text: great set !! Im happy I got also the small ball .. it’s very useful for a lot of exercises
customer_reviews.author: NATALY

customer_reviews.title: My order was great: )
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for the fast delivery. My order was great:)
customer_reviews.author: Anabel
